sentences.sentence: She would seclude herself from the world forever.
sentences.translation: 她要永远摆脱这个世界。

sentences.sentence: Culture shock symptoms are really hard to seclude.
sentences.translation: 文化休克症状是真的很难隔绝。

sentences.sentence: Seclude the reading nook from other parts of the room if possible.
sentences.translation: 如果有可能的话，最好把读书角和房间其他空间分开。
